DOC.brief_summary: This phase II trial design evaluate efficacy obinutuzumab bendamustine treatment participant refractory relapse chronic lymphocytic leukemia ( CLL ) . Participants receive six 28-day cycle treatment . Treatment consist intravenous ( IV ) administration obinutuzumab bendamustine . Treatment time expect last 6 month , participant follow-up last 2 year .
